title: Understanding DSM-5-TR
text: The DSM-5-TR is a comprehensive manual used by healthcare professionals. It provides standardized criteria for the classification of mental disorders.

title: Purpose of DSM-5-TR
text: Consider the role of DSM-5-TR in clinical practice and research. It serves as a common language for professionals from various backgrounds.

hintAnswer: a reference guide to clinical practice and is utilized as a common language for clinicians and researchers from many different backgrounds. The $$DSM-5-TR$$ is also considered a tool for collecting and communicating accurate public health statistics on mental disorder frequency, morbidity, and mortality rates
